diapo.h3: A good web-developper should manage a lots of web techs
diapo.fig_: I learned web technologies by myself but also trough academy (EMWEB, OpenClassrooms, ..)

diapo.h3: Marketing is essential for any web developper
diapo.fig_: I started long time ago a lots of marketing concepts related to the Internet.

diapo.h3: Google is essential not just for marketing on the Internet
diapo.fig_: ...but also in web-development. Yeah, google is my best freind, and I assume it is the same for you. I am taking google certifications every years since 2018.

diapo.h3: Becoming freelance in web-development and more..
diapo.fig_: I am searching for a good job of course, where I could collect always more skills. But on the same time, I aim developping an individual activity to offer services in web-development all around the world trough the the Internet.

article.title: Hello you!
p: My name is Cyrille ACHI, I am 33 year old now and I am pleased to present myself to you today ! I hope we'll meet soon !
Middlewhile, please let know more about me, fill free to contact me for any purpose you would, or more, take a glance at what I am able to do in web-development as a Fullstack web developper.
Of course, feel free to visit me on social networks with links you'll finid on bottom on this portfolio !

showContacts.alt: localise where you can meet archist webdevelopper
see archist webdevelopper's activities on the Internet

intro.h2: We only become what we are because of our childhood story.. Knowing someone is knowing his childhood
intro.p:
I was born in Ivory Coast, in west Africa. My father is an Ivoirian, and my mother is French, they are both christian engaged in everyday life.
I have 4 brothers et sisters, now only my sister and I live in France, all others live in Ivory Coast.
I did international (Mermoz) and french (BlaisePascal) school there.
It was an happy childhood, and Ivory Coast miss me quite often even if poverty there is overwhelming, my family and old good friends still live there, so is the primary reason why..
Finally, due to insecured event around 2005, I came prematurely to finish my high school in France in 1st grade of scientist stream in the Pierre d'Ailly high school in Oise, Picardie. I really really liked this little place evenif it is a small cold country town :) I made very good friends I just could not imagine I would have. It certainly means that bad events can bright good opportunities ;)
intro.button: the short story of my childhood

universitaire.h3: Second part of an instruct person's soul: the university path
universitaire.p: My university path is not unidirectional, and is made of back and forth. The more essential is that I Finally found what I really want to do of my life, isn't it ?!

items.p: The R&T department trains neticians * who will be recruited in the IT field applied to the transmission of all types of data. They are specialists in administration, maintenance, security and evolution of computer networks.

The MASS course of the MIASHS License prepares students for entry into Schools of Statistics (ISUP), Grandes Ecoles (ENSAE, ENSAI, ...), in Engineering Schools, Business Schools, in the Magistrates of Financial Engineering. Holders of this course may in particular choose the following UNS Masters: 1)Economic Expertise; 2) Mathematical Engineering.

items.h4: MULTIMEDIA COMPUTING APPLIED TO HUMAN SCIENCES
items.p: The IMApp Professional License aims to train technicians with dual skills. The initial competence is completed in one year by a topical technical competence, Multimedia Computing applied to the development of websites. The pedagogy is focused on the acquisition of website development techniques, immediately put into practice through realistic 'concrete' projects and the systematic professionalization of acquired skills.
The future graduate will be able to create responsive websites that comply with the constraints of the web environment in terms of accessibility, ergonomics and compliance with standards.

Here at OpenClassrooms, we pinpoint the key skills needed for the most in-demand jobs and develop courses and diplomas to train our students in those areas. That’s why we've developed this one-year bachelor’s-level diploma in web development, which you can complete entirely online with the help of a dedicated mentor.

webdev.h3: Finally, I well understood that web computing is one of the only things that could let me flourish

items.h4: Then I understood th background of the profession
The future looks great, but still stay the futur, uncertain, hard to grab, and strewn with pitfalls
